query:
fragment productV3 on ProductWithVariantsOutput {
  id
  quantitySetByUser
  promotedPrice @include(if: $isEnableAdvancedPromotion)
  promotion @include(if: $isEnableAdvancedPromotion) {
    unitPriceAfterPromotion
    discountAmount
    expectedPromotedPrice
    __typename
  }
  customAttributesForShopifyCheckoutFE @include(if: $isEnableAdvancedPromotion) {
    key
    value
    __typename
  }
  title
  brand
  description
  vendor
  size
  displayPrice
  originPrice
  priceUnit
  discountStartDate
  discountEndDate
  productType
  imageUrls
  seller
  sku
  skuCode
  variants {
    id
    sku
    price
    inventoryQuantity
    outsideOfDeliveryZone
    compareAtPrice
    discountStartDate
    discountEndDate
    storeCode
    __typename
  }
  minVariantPrice
  maxVariantPrice
  totalInventory
  measurements {
    height
    length
    width
    dimensionUnit
    weight
    weightUnit
    __typename
  }
  sellerDetails {
    shopId
    shopName
    fulfilledByPlatform
    marketplaceType
    __typename
  }
  shippingInfo {
    zone
    shippingPrice
    deliveryTimeEarliestDays
    deliveryTimeLatestDays
    deliveryTimeEarliestDate
    deliveryTimeLatestDate
    __typename
  }
  categoryIds
  shelfNumber
  status
  badges {
    name
    handle
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment basketV3 on BasketStoreExpansion {
  id
  deviceId
  shopifyId
  hashed @include(if: $isEnableAdvancedPromotion)
  advancedPromotions @include(if: $isEnableAdvancedPromotion) {
    simplePromotionId
    complexPromotionId
    description
    __typename
  }
  basketItems {
    ...productV3
    __typename
  }
  voucherId
  minimumSpend
  shippingFee
  shippingRule {
    shippingRanges {
      to
      from
      value
      __typename
    }
    minimumBasket
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

mutation updateBasket($deviceId: String, $accessToken: String!, $storeCode: String!, $storeCodes: [String!], $basketItems: [BasketItemInput!]!, $voucherId: String, $isEnableAdvancedPromotion: Boolean!) {
  basketUpdate: basketUpdateV3(
    deviceId: $deviceId
    accessToken: $accessToken
    basketItems: $basketItems
    voucherId: $voucherId
    storeCode: $storeCode
    storeCodes: $storeCodes
  ) {
    ...basketV3
    __typename
  }
}
